title: RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO A MEMORANDUM OF AGREEMENT WITH THE ASSOCIATION OF MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES OF LOS BANOS, LAGUNA (AMELBA- UNA, INC.) AND KAISER INTERNATIONAL HEALTH GROUP, INC. FOR HEALTH MAINTENANCE ORGANIZATION (HMO) BENEFITS FOR QUALIFIED CIVILIAN PERSONNEL OF THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS IN ACCORDANCE WITH SECTION 7.1.1. OF THE DEPARTMENT OF BUDGET AND MANAGEMENT BUDGET CIRCULAR NO. 2024-06 FOR CY 2025.
